column2: This character suffers from the autoimmune disorder today known as Chron's disease. Periodically, they are racked with intense abdominal pains as their white blood cells attack their digestive system. While debilitating, this condition certainly frees up time to read.

This character has manifested the autoimmune disorder today known as Chron's disease. Periodically, they will be racked with intense abdominal pains as their white blood cells attack their digestive system. While debilitating, this condition will certainly free up time to read.
